label: Dataverse
description: An instance of the Dataverse repository. For more information about this repository type, visit: https://dataverse.org/

label: DSpace
description: An instance of the dSPACE repository. For more information about this repository type, visit: https://duraspace.org/dspace/

label: CKAN
description: An instance of the CKAN repository. For more information about this repository type, visit: https://ckan.org/

label: ENA - Sequence Reads
description: An instance of the ENA repository for raw sequence reads submissions. For more information about this repository type, visit: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/

label: ENA - Sequence Assemblies
description: An instance of the ENA repository for genome or transcriptome assemblies submissions. For more information about this repository type, visit: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/

label: Figshare
description: An instance of the Figshare repository for submission of diverse data types including PDFs, image, audio, and video files. For more information about this repository type, visit: https://figshare.com/
